name: Chaireturn
tag_list: income-tax-return, efiling, tax-return, online-efiling, it-return, chaireturn-com, free-efiling
overview:
chaireturn.com is the Indian Income Tax Return e-Filing website. chaireturn website is helping taxpayers to file their income tax returns in a easiest way.

chaireturn.com founded in 2011 by young chartered accountants based at Hyderabad. Since then chaireturn.com is adding new features every year to provide the best service to the client.

chaireturn team has the right mix of chartered accountants, tax experts and experienced tech guys.

chaireturn.com website designed in such a way that client can just upload his form-16 along with some basic details. From then chaireturn tax experts do everything for client. To do everything chaireturn charges just Rs.229/- only.

Chaireturn.com is the salaried employees best portal as they need to do only 2 things - one should be register himself with chaireturn.com and other should be uploading of his Form-16 by filling some basic data. That’s all, from that point chaireturn team takes forward to file the income tax return.

Below are the facts of chaireturn.com

  1. chaireturn.com is the Chartered Accountant’s product
  2. chaireturn.com is authorized as e-Return Intermediary and recognized by the Govt of India
  3. chaireturn.com is providing the service of virtual tax drive with free of cost. Client can save all his tax related docs, mails at one place and retrieve as and when required
  4. Each return prepared, reviewed and e-Filed by CA’s
  5. chaireturn.com only providing LIVE CHAT, FREE CALL support form the website to answer the client queries instantly
  6. chaireturn.com is secured with 256-bit SSL encryption to ensure client data is secured
  7. Finally, chaireturn.com NEVER SELLS CLIENT DATA TO ANYONE

offices.address2: Leela Nagar x Roads, Near Indo-US Hospital, Ameerpet
